mapper.select: SELECT * FROM(SELECT P_NAME,P_DATE,V_DATE,CEIL(TO_DATE(V_DATE)-SYSDATE)+1 E_DATE FROM PAYMENT JOIN PAYMENT_CODE USING(P_CODE) WHERE M_CODE = #{m_code}) WHERE E_DATE > 0
SELECT P_NAME,P_DATE,V_DATE,CEIL(TO_DATE(V_DATE)-SYSDATE)+1 E_DATE FROM PAYMENT JOIN PAYMENT_CODE USING(P_CODE) WHERE M_CODE = #{m_code} ORDER BY P_DATE DESC
